20110123014931.000|20110123014931.000|CC1|   STAYING ACTIVE CAN ACTUALLY  
20110123014931.000|20110123014934.000|CC1|     EASE ARTHRITIS SYMPTOMS.   
20110123014934.000|20110123014936.000|CC1|    BUT IF YOU HAVE ARTHS,      
20110123014936.000|20110123014936.000|CC1|          STAYING ACTIVE        
20110123014936.000|20110123014938.000|CC1|        CAN BE DIFFICULT.       
20110123014938.000|20110123014938.000|CC1|      PRESCRIPTION CELEBREX     
20110123014938.000|20110123014940.000|CC1| CAN HELP RELIEVE ARTHRITIS PAIN
